name: Dream Burrow
description:
*Note: The game may take some time to load. If it takes too long please refresh your page.*

Dream Burrow Play as a mouse in a dream. Collect cheese to keep moving while avoiding the nightmares. How deep can you go?

Controls: Play using your Mouse.

This game was made over the course of 3 days for the Ludum Dare 48 game jam. The theme was Deeper and Deeper.

Credits:
  • Art by Aly El Din Sakr (RatFace)
  • Code by Klirik
  • Audio by Cycriel

Code was done in Unity, and the art/animation in Procreate

PS. Feedback is very much encouraged! Comment your score and any feedback you have, or bugs you encounter!

Concept Art: After several iterations, this was the look I settled on. Soon after, I was already creating the sprites!
For the color palette, apart from the shades of purples, I went for Hot pink & blue for clouds, yellow & orange for UI elements and off-white, pink & brown for the MouseCloud using the color palette and a textured brush on Procreate
The Mouse Death Animation unfortunately didn't make it in due to causing more trouble than it's worth (lots of bugs)
The Nightmare Enemy has two 3 states, idlle, alerted (when player enters range) and chasing (self explanatory) A quick transition to play between scenes (transparent background)
